Posts.Content: Dear Pink I just completed one year and three months of Chemo and Radiation this past Friday,I experience pain 24/7 around the breast area and rib cage, my arm is still swollen and feels like a log sometimes.I feel the most pain during the night,I can't seem to get fixed in the bed just right to prevent this pain,any position I sleep in just doesn't work for me. However,I feel this is something I can certainly learn to live with after all I have been through this past year and a half. My doctor did say however that this pain may very well be there for years to come. My life is beautiful, I feel brand new again just minus a boob.
Posts.Title: Breast still tender 1yr later after lumpectomy
